Articles.Content:
Is there a mod out there which has 5m or 7.5m command pods following the normal conical shape? I have ran into a few applications in my career games where I would like to carry more than 3 or 4 Kerbals, and having a hitchhiker disrupts the re-entry stability of my ship. I would be looking for something like a 5m base with a 2.5m top node, basically a Mk 1-2 pod with all dimensions doubled. 

I also play 10x scale often, so I could use the larger pod to fit with larger ships in general.
Near Future Spacecraft has a 6-manned capsule that's 5 m (i think) at the base and 2.5 at the top. It's not completely conical but... it works.

If you're not wedded to the 5m size factor, Mod Pods might solve your problem as well:

It's a set of add-ons for the Mk1-2 pod - basically a continuous transition up a size.  There's a variety of parts, including a crew pod with a capacity of 8.  (Not including the Mk1-2, which you'd put on the front...)

4 hours ago, DStaal said:

If you're not wedded to the 5m size factor, Mod Pods might solve your problem as well:

It's a set of add-ons for the Mk1-2 pod - basically a continuous transition up a size.  There's a variety of parts, including a crew pod with a capacity of 8.  (Not including the Mk1-2, which you'd put on the front...)

Actually, Mod Pods does have a fuel tank that fits with the rest of them that goes from 3.75 to 5 meters.  It basically means you have a 2.5m pod on top, a Mod Pod section under that (whether it's a fuel tank, service bay, science bay, or whatever else he's using for that size), and under that, the 3.75-5m adapter/fuel tank.  I know the mod dev is still adding new sections, so he may add more pods in the 3.75-5m form-factor.

I use it, and I've already got a lander built with Mod Pods, but I haven't unlocked enough larger stuff to lift it to orbit or carry it anywhere else yet.
Planetary Bases Command Hub fits the 5m profile on the bottom (though not exactly) and 2.5m on top. IIRC 6 kerbals of crew, probe control AND a laboratory on board.

Did you see this mod? I think it's 3.75, but it's pretty cool and accommodates a crew of 6.

You can use a 3.75m pod and then build a 5m conical fairing behind it. Turn off deploy so the fairing is treated as a permanent piece and then fill it with all of your small accessory parts. Call it your Service Module
